games.title: Bark & Blast
games.description: Crash-land on a post-apocalyptic planet in BARK N BLAST! Help a brave alien dog survive and escape in this thrilling 2D platformer action RPG. Test your aim, strategy, and courage in an epic adventure. Play now and conquer the challenges!
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard 
- Move left: A
- Move right: D
- Jump: W
- Aim and shoot with mouse 

Mobile 
 Move and turn - joystick
 Jump - jump button
